spatial_accuracy.notes: Poor room placement for BED-2 and BED-3, and associated bathrooms. Significant wall alignment issues throughout. Multiple doors are missing or misplaced. Windows are also largely misplaced or missing. Room proportions for BED-2 and BED-3 are heavily distorted.

structural_fidelity.notes: Wall thickness is inconsistent, particularly for exterior walls. Many doors are incorrectly embedded or missing. Adjacency relationships are incorrect for BED-2 and BED-3 with their bathrooms. Multiple rooms are missing. There are also hallucinated structural elements.

furniture_mapping.notes: Furniture placement is inaccurate in almost every room, especially in bedrooms and bathrooms. Furniture scale is inconsistent, with some items appearing oversized or undersized relative to the room or other furniture.

aesthetic_quality.notes: The isometric camera angle is acceptable, and orthographic projection is generally maintained. Lighting quality is fair but could be improved. There are some minor geometry distortions. Visual clarity is decent, but the composition could be better due to structural inaccuracies.

detected_errors.description: BED-2 and BED-3 rooms are significantly misplaced relative to the original plan.
TOI-4 bathroom is missing.
Foyer is missing.
Many interior walls are misaligned or shifted, especially around BED-2, BED-3, and the kitchen/utility area.
Door to BED-2 is missing.
Door to TOI-4 is missing.
Door to BED-3 is misplaced and incorrectly oriented.
Door to Utility is misplaced.
Multiple windows along the exterior walls are misplaced or absent.
Proportions of BED-2 and BED-3 are heavily distorted; they appear much smaller and narrower in the 3D render.
Proportions of the Living/Dining area appear narrower.
Wall thickness is inconsistent, particularly exterior walls and some interior partition walls.
Many doors are not correctly embedded within walls, showing gaps or being placed incorrectly.
Hallucinated wall section creating an enclosed space where the Foyer should be.
The deck associated with BED-1 is completely missing.
Furniture in BED-2 and BED-3 is incorrectly placed and scaled.
Kitchen and Utility room furniture and appliances are inaccurately placed.
Some furniture items exhibit inconsistent scaling relative to the room and other items.
A small hallucinated room/enclave appears near the bottom right of the render, not present in the floor plan.
Orientation of the bed in BED-2 is incorrect relative to the door.
Multiple planters and decorative elements on the deck of Living/Dining are missing.
